page.title: 05Outdoor Games in Fetcham
page.content: To play{Snake It}first choose 'It'. The players then spread out and 'It' chases them. When 'It' catches a player the player and 'It' hold hands. These two chase the other players until another is caught and joins the chain. This continues until the chain is complete. The game starts again and the person that was caught first is 'It'. To play{One Knee Catch}stand in a circle. One player throws the ball to another player who if he catches it throws it to someone else. If a player drops a ball he goes down on one knee. If he fails to catch the next ball he goes down on two knees. The next time he uses one hand and then he is out. If he catches a ball he returns to his last condition. Other games include football, rounders,cricket & whippet.
